data.name: A House of Thieves Demo
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Polish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher 64-bit
  • Processor: 2 Cores @ 3GHz (i5-4690/Ryzen 3 3200G)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 1050-Ti/AMD R9 380
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
